attributes.action: Stop motor insurance companies charging you for Non fault claims
attributes.background: Motorist are getting penalised for non fault claims and these are getting added to the premiums even though people take out no claims protection. It is acceptable your premium goes up in a fault claim but not in a non fault claim!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the rules on no claims discounts are a matter for insurance companies and not the UK Government or Parliament.
